mapper.select:
select * from ( select distinct ord.PK_ORD id, alias.alias name, ord.spec, org.PRICE from bd_ord ord inner join bd_ord_alias alias on alias.pk_ord = ord.pk_ord and alias.del_flag = '0' inner join BD_ORD_ORG org on ord.PK_ORD = org.PK_ORD where ord.del_flag = '0' and ord.flag_active = '1' and ord.flag_ip = '1' and alias.spcode like '%${spCode}%'
) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

select * from ( SELECT pd.pk_pd id, pd.SPEC, pd.note description, pd.PRICE, als.alias name FROM bd_pd pd INNER join bd_pd_as als ON pd.pk_pd = als.pk_pd AND als.del_flag = '0' where pd.flag_rm = '0' and pd.flag_reag = '0' and als.spcode like '%${spCode}%' ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
